abstract: Apple sent out invitations for a special event heralding its “latest creation.”
snippet: Apple sent out invitations for a special event heralding its “latest creation.”
lead_paragraph: Apple sent e-mail invitations to journalists Monday morning for a “special event” to be held next Wednesday in San Francisco. “Come see our latest creation,” the message says.

headline.main: Apple to Show Off Its ‘Latest Creation’ Next Week
